<div width="80%;">
<h3>Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This product belongs to the Brazilian Annual Land Use and Land Cover Mapping Project, producing the first annual, high-resolution land cover dataset of Brazil.
</p>

<h3>Subdatsets</h3>
| name                              | description                 |
|---------------------------------- |-----------------------------|
|`amazonia`|Land cover of the Amazonia region|
|`cerrado`|Land cover of Cerrado region|
|`pampa`|Land cover of the Pampa region|
|`pantanal`|Land cover of the Pantanal region|
|`mataatlantica`|Land cover of the Mata Atlantica region|
</div>
